chat

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • chat.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a chat message

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest containing information about the sender, receiver and the content of the message

      • Message

        public Message(java.lang.String from,
       java.lang.String to,
       java.lang.String message,
       int number)
        Represents a chat message
        Parameters:
        from - username of the sender
        to - username of the receiver
        message - content of the message
        number - not used for now. Could be used to order messages with some kind of logic order, or validation.

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSON()
                           throws org.json.JSONException
        Returns:
        message representation in JSON, in order to communicate with the chat javascript running in the client.

        org.json.JSONException
